title: Judge Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a judge, someone who presides over legal proceedings and makes rulings.  Often associated with fairness, justice, and authority. This variation shows a medium-dark skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: The judge emoji with a medium-dark skin tone on Apple devices embodies authority and fairness, depicted with a stern yet dignified expression and a crisp, dark robe. Apple's characteristic 3D shading and realistic lighting lend a sense of gravitas and presence to the figure, while the smooth, rounded edges ensure approachability. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for discussions about law, justice, decisions, or when seeking a fair resolution.
